name: Giant Bow [3]
description: Its name is Giant Bow. Since it is big and heavy, it will be difficult to handle. But its powerful attack is impressive.

name: Giant Butterfly Wings
description: Item of magical power created by huge butterfly wings that can allow your teammates to move with you to a set location on the map. It is a little hard to master.

name: Giant Fly Wing
description: Item of magical power created by Giant Fly Wings that can allow your teammates to move with you anywhere on the map. It is a little hard to master.

name: Giant Shield
description: A shield similar to the shield used by a guardian giant of the ancient temple. It is made by the legendary, containing the strength of guardians.

name: Giant Shield [1]
description: A shield similar to the shield used by a guardian giant of the ancient temple. It is made by the legendary, containing the strength of guardians.

name: Gift from Nebula M78
description: A gift of gratitude from a distant kingdom to honor the contribution made by hardworking adventurers for peace and justice!  It contains several [Ultraman’s Cosmic Breath] used to redeem great rewards prepared for adventurers by the Kingdom of Light.

name: Gift of Love and Courage
description: To celebrate this special day, open up will guarantee to get a Seed of Mastela and receive one of the following: 2 Lightning Chain, 600 Honor Proof, 4 Mora Coins, 3 Mithril, 2 Valkyrie's Gift, 2 Gold Medal

name: Gift Voucher I
description: The voucher with mystery runes on it. Player can use it to receive 31% headwear on monthly Gashapon toys machine.

name: Gift Voucher II
description: The voucher with mystery runes on it. Player can use it to receive 28% headwear on monthly Gashapon toys machine.

name: Gift Voucher III
description: The voucher with mystery runes on it. Player can use it to receive 23% headwear on monthly Gashapon toys machine.

name: Gift Voucher IV
description: The voucher with mystery runes on it. Player can use it to receive 7% headwear on monthly Gashapon toys machine.

name: Gift Voucher V
description: Advanced orange coupon. Player can use it to receive 6% headwear on monthly Gashapon toys machine.

name: Gift Voucher VI
description: Advanced gold coupon. Player can use it to receive 5% headwear on monthly Gashapon toys machine.

name: Gigantic Majestic Goat
description: Helmet made of giant goat's horns. The meaning of the spell is very strong.

name: Gigantic Majestic Goat [1]
description: Helmet made of giant goat's horns. The meaning of the spell is very strong.

name: Gigantic Majestic Goat [1] Blueprint
description: Helmet made of giant goat's horns. The meaning of the spell is very strong.
